title: Hairy Hand Watch Face
summary: Hairy Hands - all colors of skin, with tattoo or plaster. Cheat your friends!
description: Hairy hand watch face includes:•  analog watch face with different colors of your skin•  digital watch face as a tattoo with different colors of your skin•  digital watch face as a band aid with different colors of your skin•  ambient mode as a rentgen of your handIf you like to be creative and natural at the same time, download this watch face and just be creative and natural.This watch face have background of your skin on hand, with or without hair. You can find here all colors of skin, beginning from pale white up to very-dark skin to even rose. What is natural it is not dirty and hairy hands is so natural.More than this you can change the theme of watch on a tattoo or on a watch with a plaster.For analog watch remember to try mode with and without numbers.And surprise, in ambient mode your watch make a rentgen of your hand. Yes, with bones. You should try hairy hand watchface!!!Hairy Hand Watch Face is working perfectly on both round and square watches.You can cheat your friends and have fun! Try to make a transparent watch in your wrist by finding your skin color. Compatible with most popular smartwatches: Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, LG Watch Urbane and many others.WARNING:Due to a lot of skin colors included, it may take up to 2 minutes to install on your smartwatch. If you have any questions, suggestions or comments please write directly to our support e-mail:vitaminlabs.help@gmail.comYour app experience is important to us. If you find any problems or issues, email vitaminlabs.help@gmail.com for a direct response and please, support the application with five stars to help spread it across the world.
descriptionHTML:
Hairy hand watch face includes:

•  analog watch face with different colors of your skin
•  digital watch face as a tattoo with different colors of your skin
•  digital watch face as a band aid with different colors of your skin
•  ambient mode as a rentgen of your hand

If you like to be creative and natural at the same time, download this watch face and just be creative and natural.

This watch face have background of your skin on hand, with or without hair. You can find here all colors of skin, beginning from pale white up to very-dark skin to even rose. What is natural it is not dirty and hairy hands is so natural.

More than this you can change the theme of watch on a tattoo or on a watch with a plaster.

For analog watch remember to try mode with and without numbers.
And surprise, in ambient mode your watch make a rentgen of your hand. Yes, with bones. You should try hairy hand watchface!!!

Hairy Hand Watch Face is working perfectly on both round and square watches.

You can cheat your friends and have fun!

Try to make a transparent watch in your wrist by finding your skin color.


Compatible with most popular smartwatches: Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, LG Watch Urbane and many others.


WARNING:
Due to a lot of skin colors included, it may take up to 2 minutes to install on your smartwatch.

If you have any questions, suggestions or comments please write directly to our support e-mail:
vitaminlabs.help@gmail.com

Your app experience is important to us. If you find any problems or issues, email vitaminlabs.help@gmail.com for a direct response and please, support the application with five stars to help spread it across the world.
